```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
options(tinytex.verbose = TRUE)

library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(png)

local_authority <- params$local_authority
year <- params$year
topic_data <- params$topic_data
comparison_type <- params$comparison_type
comparator <- params$comparator

Figure_7.1 <- topic_data[[1]]
Figure_7.2 <- topic_data[[2]]
Figure_7.3 <- topic_data[[3]]
Figure_7.4 <- topic_data[[4]]
Figure_7.5 <- topic_data[[5]]
Figure_7.6 <- topic_data[[6]]
Figure_7.7 <- topic_data[[7]]
Figure_7.8 <- topic_data[[8]]
Table_7.1 <- topic_data[[9]]
Figure_7.9 <- topic_data[[10]]
Figure_7.10 <- topic_data[[11]]
Figure_7.11 <- topic_data[[12]]
Figure_7.12 <- topic_data[[13]]
Table_7.2 <- topic_data[[14]]
Table_7.3 <- topic_data[[15]]
Table_7.4 <- topic_data[[16]]
Table_7.5 <- topic_data[[17]]
Table_7.6 <- topic_data[[18]]
Table_7.7 <- topic_data[[19]]
Table_7.8 <- topic_data[[20]]
Table_7.9 <- topic_data[[21]]
Table_7.10 <- topic_data[[22]]
Table_7.11 <- topic_data[[23]]

main_table_title <- paste0(local_authority, ", ", year)

eval_comparison <- ifelse(comparison_type == "No comparison", FALSE, TRUE)

eval_comparison_time_series <- ifelse(comparison_type == "Year" | comparison_type == "No comparison", FALSE, TRUE)

comparison_table_title <- if (comparison_type == "Local Authority") {
  paste0(comparator, ", ", year)
} else if (comparison_type == "Year") {
  paste0(local_authority, ", ", comparator)
} else {
  NULL
  }

```
